character.statement: There must be a way to get that boy out of there...
Great -- now Total is stuck in there!
How am I supposed to shake a polar bear out of a slide?
I heard there was a pop quiz scheduled for tomorrow.
Uh, hold on, I think I got that last part wrong.
I better clear out the slide first or I could get stuck too.
Is there anything I can help with?
Thanks for the vote of confidence. What do you need help with?
Why can't you just buy something from the machine?
I'll take the money and figure something out.
Shoes? Timmy might have a pair stashed at his headquarters
Yeah, and wait until you find out about the time limit!
There's one more twist you won't believe.
Oh, sorry, I was thinking of next week.
Can I interest you in a fine pair of gently used shoes?
I believe this is the feline you were looking for?
Timmy's pants are in the back of that truck!
It's up to me to investigate, then.
I haven't been down the slide yet, there is always a line at recess.
Help! I'm stuck!
Thanks! I hate cramped places.
Please. Some silly getup won't frighten me. The only thing I'm scared of is a bad grade!
A pop quiz? Oh no! Do you know what subject?

exchange.question: Geography.
exchange.answer: No problem. Geography is my best subject.

character.statement: Why, what's with the time limit?

exchange.question: It takes half an hour.
exchange.answer: I don't see a problem there.

exchange.question: It's an hour-long test!
exchange.answer: I love long tests. More time to think!

exchange.question: It's only ten minutes long.
exchange.answer: Ten minutes? What if I don't answer all the questions in time?

character.statement: What else could there possibly be?

exchange.question: This test will go on your permanent record!
This quiz makes up 10% of your grade.
exchange.answer: 10% is a lotâ€¦ but not that much.

character.statement: Arghhh! I need to study!
Oh. What a relief!
I'm going to be ready for that quiz!
I didn't know polar bears had such good coordination. Maybe he could teach me a few steps.
Where's Timmy? Where, oh where? I need Timmy's help!
You don't look as brave as Timmy, or half as good-looking, but beggars can't be choosers.
It's my cat, Senor Burrito! She's stuck in the vending machine at the bowling alley!
It only takes coins, and I only have bills!
Does that usually work for you? I'll buy something -- shoes, maybe -- but I'm not giving away my allowance.
I'll buy something -- shoes, maybe -- but I'm not giving away my allowance.
You've got a deal!
Well, you have the money. Where is Senor Burrito?
I was wrong about you! Next time, I'm coming to you first.
Mr. Burrito and I will never forget what you did for us.
I'd say ask Timmy, but I think he's still on the tower.
Timmy will lose all his clients if he doesn't stop playing around on that tower.
So much has happened, I need a shopping spree to calm my nerves.
Oh goodness, is the circus in town? I love circus acts!
